title: FROUFROU Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: frou·frou ˈfrü-(ˌ)frü variants or frou-frou plural froufrous or frou-frous 1 : a rustling especially of a woman's skirts 2 : showy or frilly ornamentation variants or frou-frou : very showy or fancy … fussy, fragile, froufrou clothes won't make it through the winter.—Elle Some people dismiss the bright yellow garnish as froufrou decoration, but they're missing the point …—Jane Daniels Lear … when she had put on her make-up, he set her on his bed in her frou-frou dressing-gown …—John le Carré Love words? Need even more definitions? Merriam-Webster unabridged
